main event: On January 14, 1966, four witnesses observed a brilliantly lighted disc-shaped object, about 40 feet in diameter, traveling at high speed over Indianapolis, Indiana.
interesting points: The object left an orangish-red trail and was visible for approximately 10 seconds,The sighting lasted a total of 19 minutes,The object traveled from southeast to northwest,The witnesses reported the object had sharp prongs or rays of light,There were multiple sightings reported in the area on different dates preceding this event.
witness description: four witnesses including a farmer and friends
